name: Deposit into or on to land
comment: Deposit into or on to land (e.g. landfill, etc.)

name: Land treatment
comment: Land treatment (e.g. biodegradation of liquid or sludgy discards in soils, etc.)

name: Deep injection
comment: Deep injection (e.g. injection of pumpable discards into wells, salt domes or naturally occurring repositories, etc.)

name: Surface impoundment
comment: Surface impoundment (e.g. placement of liquid or sludgy discards into pits, ponds or lagoons, etc.)

name: Specially engineered landfill
comment: Specially engineered landfill (e.g. placement into lined discrete cells which are capped and isolated from one another and the environment, etc.)

name: Release into a water body
comment: Release into a water body except seas/oceans

name: Release to seas/oceans
comment: Release to seas/oceans including sea-bed insertion

name: Biological treatment
comment: Biological treatment not specified elsewhere in this Annex which results in final compounds or mixtures which are discarded by means of any of the operations numbered D 1 to D 12

name: Physico-chemical treatment
comment: Physico-chemical treatment not specified elsewhere in this Annex which results in final compounds or mixtures which are discarded by means of any of the operations numbered D 1 to D 12 (e.g. evaporation, drying, calcination, etc.)

name: Incineration on land
comment: Incineration on land

name: Incineration at sea
comment: Incineration at sea (*)

name: Permanent storage
comment: Permanent storage (e.g. emplacement of containers in a mine, etc.)

name: Blending or mixing
comment: Blending or mixing prior to submission to any of the operations numbered D 1 to D 12 (**)

name: Repackaging
comment: Repackaging prior to submission to any of the operations numbered D 1 to D 13

name: Storage pending
comment: Storage pending any of the operations numbered D 1 to D 14 (excluding temporary storage, pending collection, on the site where the waste is produced) (***)

name: Use principally as a fuel
comment: Use principally as a fuel or other means to generate energy (*)

name: Solvent reclamation
comment: Solvent reclamation/regeneration

name: Recyclingof organic
comment: Recycling/reclamation of organic substances which are not used as solvents (including composting and other biological transformation processes) (**)

name: Recycling of metal
comment: Recycling/reclamation of metals and metal compounds

name: Recycling of other
comment: Recycling/reclamation of other inorganic materials (***)

name: Regeneration of acids
comment: Regeneration of acids or bases

name: Recovery for pollution abatement
comment: Recovery of components used for pollution abatement

name: Recovery from catalysts
comment: Recovery of components from catalysts

name: Oil re-refining
comment: Oil re-refining or other reuses of oil

name: Land treatment
comment: Land treatment resulting in benefit to agriculture or ecological improvement

name: Use of waste
comment: Use of waste obtained from any of the operations numbered R 1 to R 11

name: Exchange of waste
comment: Exchange of waste for submission to any of the operations numbered R 1 to R 11 (****)

name: Storage of waste
comment: Storage of waste pending any of the operations numbered R 1 to R 12 (excluding temporary storage, pending collection, on the site where the waste is produced) (*****)
